title: Science Fiction in Hollywood - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/30/21
itunes:title: Science Fiction in Hollywood - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 7/30/21
description:
George Noory and television screenwriter Marc Zicree explore his long creative career in Hollywood, suggestions on how to break into the demanding industry, and his friendship with legendary science fiction writer Ray Bradbury.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
